headline: A Look At International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) Valuation After Its Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Recent performance snapshot International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) has drawn fresh attention after a strong recent run, with the stock up about 18% over the past week and 16% over the past month. For investors, those moves sit against a mixed backdrop, including a small negative 1 year total return, weaker 3 year and 5 year records, and a current share price of $83.
